var.name: pl_pres
var.description: fixed pressure levels of input ozone mixing ratio

var.name: tend_thphysics
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to all physics processes

var.name: tend_qvphysics
var.description: tendency of water vapor mixing ratio due to all physics processes

var.name: tend_qcphysics
var.description: tendency of total cloud condensate due to all physics processes

var.name: tend_qo3physics
var.description: tendency of ozone mixing ratio due to all physics processes

var.name: tend_uphysics
var.description: tendency of reconstructed zonal wind due to all physics processes

var.name: tend_vphysics
var.description: tendency of reconstructed meridional wind due to all physics processes

var.name: tend_thradlw
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to long-wave radiation

var.name: tend_thradsw
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to short-wave radiation

var.name: tend_thdiffusion
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to diffusion

var.name: tend_thcudeep
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to deep convection and moist convective adjustment

var.name: tend_thcushallow
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to shallow convection

var.name: tend_thmicrop
var.description: tendency of potential temperature due to cloud microphysics

var.name: tend_qvdiffusion
var.description: tendency of water vapor mixing ratio due to diffusion

var.name: tend_qvcudeep
var.description: tendency of water vapor mixing ratio due to deep convection and moist convective adjustment

var.name: tend_qvcushallow
var.description: tendency of water vapor mixing ratio due to shallow convection

var.name: tend_qvmicrop
var.description: tendency of water vapor mixing ratio due to cloud microphysics

var.name: tend_qcdiffusion
var.description: tendency of total cloud water mixing ratio due to diffusion

var.name: tend_qccudeep
var.description: tendency of total cloud water mixing ratio due to deep convection and moist convective adjustment

var.name: tend_qccushallow
var.description: tendency of total cloud water mixing ratio due to shallow convection

var.name: tend_qcmicrop
var.description: tendency of total cloud water mixing ratio due to cloud microphysics

var.name: tend_qo3diffusion
var.description: tendency of ozone mixing ratio due to diffusion

var.name: tend_qo3product
var.description: tendency of ozone mixing ratio due to ozone production

var.name: tend_udiffusion
var.description: tendency of u-momentum due to diffusion

var.name: tend_ugwdo
var.description: tendency of u-momentum due to gravity wave drag over orography

var.name: tend_ucudeep
var.description: tendency of u-momentum due to deep convection

var.name: tend_ugwdc
var.description: tendency of u-momentum due to convective grsvity wave drag

var.name: tend_vdiffusion
var.description: tendency of v-momentum due to diffusion

var.name: tend_vgwdo
var.description: tendency of v-momentum due to gravity wave drag over orography

var.name: tend_vcudeep
var.description: tendency of v-momentum due to deep convection

var.name: tend_vgwdc
var.description: tendency of v-momentum due to convective grsvity wave drag

var.name: o3clim
var.description: input ozone data interpolated to current time

var.name: icsdlw
var.description: contains random seeds for sub-column cloud generators for long-wave radiation

var.name: icsdsw
var.description: contains random seeds for sub-column cloud generators for short-wave radiation

var.name: alnsf
var.description: near-infrared spectral surface albedo (strong dependence on solar zenith angle)

var.name: alnwf
var.description: near-infrared spectral surface albedo (weak dependence on solar zenith angle)

var.name: alvsf
var.description: visible spectral surface albedo (strong dependence on solar zenith angle)

var.name: alvwf
var.description: visible spectral surface albedo (weak dependence on solar zenith angle)

var.name: coszen
var.description: cosine of the solar zenith angle

var.name: tsflw
var.description: 1-m surface air temperature over long-wave interval

var.name: dlwsfc
var.description: accumulated all-sky downward surface long-wave radiation flux

var.name: ulwsfc
var.description: accumulated all-sky surface upward long-wave radiation flux

var.name: rrime
var.description: mass ratio of total to unrimed ice (Ferrier scheme)

var.name: dlwsfci
var.description: instantaneous all-sky downward surface long-wave radiation flux

var.name: ulwsfci
var.description: instantaneous all-sky upward surface long-wave radiation flux

var.name: dswsfci
var.description: instantaneous all-sky downward surface short-wave radiation flux

var.name: uswsfci
var.description: instantaneous all-sky upward surface short-wave radiation flux

var.name: landmask
var.description: land-ocean mask (=1 for land cells, = 0 for ocean cells)

var.name: orogwd
var.description: statistical fields for gravity wave drag over orography

var.name: slope
var.description: surface slope type for land-surface scheme

var.name: snowh
var.description: actual snow depth over land/sea ice

var.name: snowc
var.description: fractional snow cover over land/sea ice

var.name: smcrel
var.description: soil moisture threshold below which transpiration begins to stress
